name: wake
description: Wake monorepo: PWA, creator dashboard, landing

scripts.build:web: npm run export:web --prefix apps/pwa && node scripts/inject-expo-script.js
scripts.build:pwa: cross-env EXPO_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH=/app npm run export:web --prefix apps/pwa && node scripts/inject-expo-script.js && node scripts/rewrite-pwa-paths.js && node scripts/copy-pwa-public.js
scripts.build:creator: npm run build --prefix apps/creator-dashboard
scripts.build:all: npm run build:landing && npm run build:pwa && npm run build:creator && node scripts/assemble-hosting.js
scripts.setup:firebase: echo 'Please configure Firebase manually using the documentation'
